```{r, message=FALSE}
library(here)
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
uniprot_tbl = read_tsv(here('annotation/intermediates/uniprot_release_2020_03/uniprot_entries_tsv.gz'))
uniprot_uniparc_tbl = read_tsv(here('annotation/intermediates/uniprot_release_2020_03/uniprot_uniparc_mapping.tsv.gz')) %>%
    rename(
        uniparc_crc64_checksum = uniparc_checksum,
        uniparc_xref_uniprot_ids = uniprot_ids,
        uniparc_xref_ensembl_prot_ids = ensembl_prot_ids,
        uniparc_xref_refseq_prot_ids = refseq_prot_ids
    )
```

```{r}
uniprot_annotated_tbl = uniprot_tbl %>%
    left_join(
        uniprot_uniparc_tbl, by = c("uniprot_acc" = "original_prot_id")
    )
```

Some UniProt entries do not have HGNC IDs
```{r}
uniprot_annotated_tbl %>%
    filter(is.na(hgnc_gene_id)) %>%
    pull(uniprot_acc)
```

Only export the protein entries with HGNC ID
```{r}
uniprot_annotated_tbl.hgnc_only = uniprot_annotated_tbl %>%
    filter(!is.na(hgnc_gene_id))
```

Some UniProt entries shared the same UniParc IDs
```{r}
uniprot_annotated_tbl.hgnc_only %>% 
    arrange(uniparc_id) %>%
    group_by(uniparc_id) %>%
    filter(n() > 1)
```


```{r}
uniprot_annotated_tbl.hgnc_only %>% 
    select(-sequence) %>%
    write_tsv('../tracked_results/uniprot_reviewed_human_proteome_hgnc_only.v2020_03.tsv.gz')
```

```{r}
uniprot_sequences = Biostrings::AAStringSet(
    uniprot_annotated_tbl.hgnc_only$sequence
)
names(uniprot_sequences) = uniprot_annotated_tbl.hgnc_only %>%
    glue::glue_data("{uniprot_acc} {uniparc_id}")

uniprot_sequences %>%
    rtracklayer::export('../tracked_results/uniprot_reviewed_human_proteome_hgnc_only.v2020_03.fasta')
```
